response: "wow, did you know that companies are allowed to share your personal data without your consent? 😱 it's like, they think our private information is theirs to play with. 🤦‍♂️ i mean, what's the point of having data protection laws if they're not even enforced? 🤷‍♀️ it's time we take back control of our personal info and demand more respect for our privacy! 💪 #datenschutz #privatsphäre #rechtefürdiebürger"
